summary: This document is a set of daily activity reports and lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9-10, 2019. It details routine prison operations, inmate movements, staffing issues, and counts. The logs note several inmates on suicide watch and administrative detention, but do not specifically mention Jeffrey Epstein, who died in custody at MCC on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Ramos
persons.context: Inmate with registration #85428-054 reported on HA-Unit with an inmate companion pending bed space in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and later noted as pending bed space(SHU) in the sensitive information log.

persons.name: Jones
persons.context: Inmate with registration #06178-104 was part of a treaty transfer return that was canceled due to mechanical problems with a flight, and was returned to the institution at 3:03 AM.

persons.name: Garcia
persons.context: Inmate with registration #79043-054 (Code #111) was reported placed on the Special Housing Unit during the Day Watch Shift. Later log shows 'GARCIA-PENA 79043-054' placed in Administrative Detention for reason '331 KN' at 8:28 PM.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: Inmate with registration #86824-054 was reported placed on a Dry Cell in R&D holding cell during the Evening Watch Shift.

persons.name: Bright
persons.context: Inmate with registration #476309-054 was on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion, noted in the Daily Sensitive Information.

persons.name: Gentile
persons.context: Inmate with registration #71230-054 was on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion, noted in the Daily Sensitive Information.

events.title: Daily Prison Operations and Counts
events.description: Routine prison operations at MCC New York including multiple inmate counts, equipment checks, and monitoring of inmates on suicide watch and in administrative detention.

events.title: Canceled Treaty Transfer for Inmate Jones
events.description: Inmate Jones's treaty transfer was canceled due to mechanical problems with the flight, resulting in his return to the institution.

events.title: Inmate Placements in Special Housing and Dry Cell
events.description: Inmate Garcia was placed on the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and later in Administrative Detention. Inmate Fernandez was placed on a Dry Cell in R&D.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a daily operations log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 9-10, 2019.
It records several inmates on suicide watch (Bright and Gentile) and others in special housing or administrative detention (Ramos, Garcia, Fernandez).
A treaty transfer for inmate Jones was canceled due to flight mechanical problems.
The log notes chronic staffing shortages leading to vacated correctional assignments.
The Control Center Fire Panel was reported as inoperative.
